mapper.select: SELECT * FROM publictask WHERE pcode=#{pcode} ORDER BY trefference ASC, tsequence ASC
SELECT MAX(tsequence) FROM publictask WHERE pcode=#{pcode} AND tcode=trefference;
SELECT MAX(tsequence) FROM publictask WHERE trefference=#{trefference} AND NOT tcode=trefference;
SELECT * FROM publictask WHERE tcode=trefference AND pcode=#{pcode};

SELECT a.tcode, a.ttitle, a.tcolor, a.tsdate, a.tedate, a.tpercent, a.tsequence, a.trefference, a.pcode, ( SELECT count(*) FROM publictask b WHERE b.trefference = a.tcode) as count FROM publictask a WHERE trefference=#{trefference} AND tcode !=trefference;
mapper.update: UPDATE publictask SET ttitle=#{ttitle}, tcolor=#{tcolor}, tsdate=#{tsdate}, tedate=#{tedate}, tpercent=#{tpercent} , trefference=#{trefference}, tsequence=#{tsequence} WHERE tcode=#{tcode}
